content: | blocking optional body repeat weave in ends soak in lukewarm water row 1 ws for at least 15 minutes gently wring out *p1 k1* 2 times p to last 4 sts *k1 p1* to excess water until it is just damp end arrange the collar to be folded or flat as row 2 rs preferred *k1 p1* 2 times k to last 4 sts *p1 k1* to end allow to air dry completely & enjoy your new tiny cardigan repeat 2 times total ending after a rs row ribbed hem repeat i hope you enjoyed this pattern row 1 ws for questions and pattern support please p1 *k1 p1* to end email me at gingkobe@gmail com click these to row 2 rs find me on thank you for your support k1 *p1 k1* to end instagram and see more pattern inspo repeat 2 times total ending after a rs @gingko be row #bubucardi abbreviations bobble - bind off m1r - make 1 stitch right work 2 stitches as stated in pattern pass the insert lhn under the bar between the st you right stitch on the right hand needle over the just knit and the next st on the needle from left stitch and off of the right hand needle back to front knit through the front loop for a binding it off twisted stitch that leans right you have now increased 1 stitch co - cast on the long tail and backwards e loop for p … - purl number of stitches underarm cast on are suggested for this with the working yarn in front insert the right pattern needle into the next stitch on the left needle from back to front wrap the working yarn k … - knit number of stitches around the tip of the right needle counter- with the working yarn in back insert the right clockwise and pull that loop through the needle into the next stitch on the left needle stitch from front to back wrap the working yarn around the tip of the right needle clockwise pm - place marker and pull the loop through the stitch rhn - right hand needle k2tog - knit 2 together insert the right hand needle into the next 2 rm - remove marker stitches knitwise and knit them together you have now decreased 1 stitch rs - right side lhn - left hand needle sm - slip marker m - marker ssk - slip slip knit slip 1 st knitwise slip 1 st purlwise insert lhn m1l - make 1 stitch left into the front legs of both sts then knit them insert lhn under the bar between the st you together through the back loops you have just knit and the next st on the needle from now decreased 1 stitch front to back knit through the back loop for a twisted stitch that leans left you have now ws - wrong side increased 1 stitch
